name: James Smith

responses.Big Footprint: My feet are of length less that this footprint.
responses.Small Footprint: The great motherboard has blessed me with feet this small - it allows me to still buy childrens shoes and they are much cheaper!
responses.Glasses: The great motherboard grants all of her followers with superb sight to spot all bugs in code.
responses.Bag: Disciples need not carry earthly belongings, for all our information is stored in the great cloud.
responses.Lipstick: Lipstick is a waste of our great motherboard's glorious time - why put on makeup when code should be being written!
responses.Right Handed: The right hand is the most righteous one.
responses.Dark Hair: A true believer in the great motherboard has no hair.

noneResponses: Everyone is a student of the great motherboard.
